instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3330: What is 820-3330? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3330</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> backlight working, blank screen
threads.message:
Liquid damage board.

Backlight working, blank screen. Tested with a good screen no difference. 
Connector looks fine. Will test voltages.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3330</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> backlight working, blank screen
threads.message: probably <SIGNAL>PP3V3_SW_LCD</SIGNAL> is missing. check L9000 and trace to the LCD connector.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3330</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> backlight working, blank screen
threads.message:
Do you mean pure white, or black screen?
In first case, missing 3.3V for TFT matrix on the LCD...
